thread.title: A+K Cartmell
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by A+K Cartmell

author: A+K Cartmell
title: A+K Cartmell
text: Goway arranged for our personal trip to Thailand, Cambodia, and ended with 3 nights in Hong Kong. Very enjoyable! The guides were very good, and were flexible so we could add items into our itinerary. Guides picked us up (at airport, railway station, or each morning at the hotel) and gave us tips for activities to do on our own.
